languages.text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, their cover efficiency is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled if the Operative has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} находится в частичном укрытии, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытия{/g} возрастает на 15%. Если в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} оперативник не двигается, этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается.

traits.locale_text: While the Adept is in half cover, their cover efficiency is increased by +15%. This bonus is doubled if the Adept has not moved during their turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда адепт находится в частичном укрытии, эффективность укрытия увеличивается на +15%. Если в свой ход адепт не двигается, этот бонус удваивается.
Когда адепт находится в частичном укрытии, эффективность укрытия увеличивается на +15%. Если в свой ход адепт не двигается, этот бонус удваивается.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}身处{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半身掩体{/g}时，掩体效果提高15%。如果特工在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内未移动过，则此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}翻倍。

This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled if the Operative has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当技师身处半身{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}时，掩体效果提高15%。如果技师在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内未移动过，则此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}翻倍。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} está en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g}, su eficacia de cobertura aumenta un +15 %. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se duplica si el agente no se mueve durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, their cover efficiency is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled if the Operative has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el agente está en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g}, su eficacia de cobertura aumenta un +15 %. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se duplica si el agente no se mueve durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半遮蔽物{/g}内にいる間、遮蔽効率が+15%増加する。オペレーターが自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}時に移動しない場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は2倍になる。
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, their cover efficiency is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled if the Operative has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半遮蔽物{/g}内にいる間、遮蔽効率が+15%増加する。オペレーターが自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}時に移動しない場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は2倍になる。

languages.text: Während der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}teilweiser Deckung{/g} hat, ist seine Deckungseffizienz um +15 % erhöht. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} verdoppelt sich, falls sich der Agent während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} nicht bewegt hat.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, their cover efficiency is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled if the Operative has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Während der Agent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}halbe Deckung{/g} hat, ist seine Deckungseffizienz um +15 % erhöht. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} verdoppelt sich, falls sich der Agent während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} nicht bewegt hat.

languages.text: Lorsque l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} n'est que {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partiellement sous couverture{/g}, l'efficacité de cette couverture augmente de +15 %. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est doublé si l'agent ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, their cover efficiency is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled if the Operative has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} de l'Adepte n'est que partielle, l'efficacité de cette couverture augmente de +15 %. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est doublé si l'Adepte ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}kısmi siperdeyken{/g} siper etkililiği +%15 artar. Ajan o {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} hiç hareket etmemişse bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ikiye katlanır.
